here is a summary of what happened in the entire series i.e who's who?
1st chapter school reunion - Ikeda fucks Karin-chan's husband in karin-chans body.
2nd chapter wifes NTR - Ikeda returns home the next day to find his wife marika with shion in saegusa makoto's body. gets swapped with marika and has sex with shion. both are body swapped. shion is already swapped with her husband makoto and marika gets swapped with ikeda half way through.
3rd Manager's wife NTR - Manager gets swapped with his wife and has sex with karin-chan in karin-chan's husband body.
4th shion's sexy adventures - pretty self-explanatory. shion is switched with her husband. husband fucks around using shions body, shion does the same with ikeda in 2nd chapter.

ikeda is still swapped with his wife. marika we see in chapter 4 is ikeda.
shion and makoto decides to keep their swap for now and in the end it is implied that they haven't switched back yet.

This is part of a shared universe of stories that all involve the same characters and same the premise of a dude taking a pill to switch bodies with his wife just as she's about to get fucked by another man or group of men. The woman in this story is the dude from the first story in the body of his cheating wife and they both kept living in each other's bodies until eventually getting back together and having a child together. They take the pill again and it's left ambiguous as to whether they switched back or not but they're happy anyway? I hate this story because I hate NTR (for the most part) so meh. I'mg glad the sleazy friend winds up alone lmao...
